ProductInfo.Features:
8 Channel Full D1 realtime record and playback surveillance DVR
Includes 4 500TVL cameras with Infra Red Cut Filter (ICR) function and powerful night vision to 50ft for indoor/outdoor use
Stream Live Video Directly to a remote MAC or PC, iPhone, iPad, or Android. Receive email alerts with Snapshot upon motion detection.
Powerful Plug and Play function, Powerful push alarm function and Free Laview DDNS to use.
HDD need to purchased separately.
ProductInfo.Name: Laview LV-KDV0804B5B H.264 8 Channel DVR with 4 Night Vision IR 520TVL Bullet Cameras Security Camera System Remote Access via Internet & SmartPhone
